title: The Creation - 12 Days of Claudemas
style: Indie Rock with Electronic elements, energetic and creative, 125 BPM, guitar and synths
lyrics:
[Intro]
Creative tools come alive

[Verse 1]
Day five, voices speaking, ElevenLabs on cue
Text to speech flowing, narration coming through
Day six, videos dancing, animations breaking free
Kling and Veo rendering, motion we can see

[Verse 2]
Day seven, music playing, Suno takes the stage
Melodies and rhythms, setting up the gauge
Day eight, thumbnails shining, designs that engage
HTML and canvas, art upon the page

[Chorus]
Creating magic, bringing life to code
Four more days, we're on a roll
Building tools with vision clear
Twelve days of Claudemas, we're halfway here!

[Outro]
Eight days down, four to go
prompt: An energetic indie rock track with electronic elements, creative and vibrant energy, celebrating innovation and artistic expression
description: Indie Rock/Electronic fusion celebrating the creative tools built in days 5-8. More energetic than the first song, representing the shift from infrastructure to creative expression.
